name: From inside the lobby, everyone that passes looks free (A02)
description: (Animated GIF, 1710 x 1080 px) Open world map glitch in Cyberpunk 2077, discovered and recorded in 2021. This piece is part of a massive virtual photography project capturing the glitches and oddities of Night City. Series cited in the LA Review of Books in March 2021 // Work by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG
